overview: Elegant Angel presents It's A Brotha' Thing! Vol. 3 over 2 hours of steamy interracial step family fun! Step Families gone wild in this incredible interracial adventure! These girls can't get enough of their new black step brothers! For all you taboo / interracial lovers out there this is your ultimate fantasy! Featuring all brand new scenes in our new twist on the best selling It's a Mommy / Daddy / Family thing series. It's a Brotha Thing 3 is a sexually sophisticated depiction of taboo fantasy role playing at its best! Starring an All-Star cast Alina Lopez, Kendra Spade, Layla Love and Alex Blue ! Enjoy!
title: It's a Brotha' Thing! 3
